name: Electrojam
body:
### Welcome to ElectroJam.
ElectroJam is an Android application which lets you create sample based music using your (Android based) smartphone and/or tablet device. You can create this music on a single device, or create a "jam session" with multiple devices connected to the same WiFi network.

### Authors and Contributors
ElectroJam was created by David Jennes (@djbe) and Jean Patry (@jptr) during a course for development for mobile devices at [Télécom ParisTech](www.telecom-paristech.fr), taught by professor Samuel Tardieu (@samueltardieu). After we course we decided to continue developing this application and hope it might be of interest to other people.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with ElectroJam? Make sure to check out the [issue tracker](/djbe/ElectroJam/issues) and, if need be, create a new issue.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
